Samples.Name: TextToolbar
Samples.About: A Toolbar for Editing Text attached to a RichEditBox. It can format RTF and Markdown, or use a Custom Formatter, and specify your own Formatter with Buttons and Actions.

Samples.Name: Carousel
Samples.About: Presents items in a carousel control. It reacts to changes in the layout as well as the content so it can adapt to different form factors automatically.

Samples.Name: AdaptiveGridView
Samples.About: Presents items in a evenly-spaced set of columns to fill the total available display space. It reacts to changes in the layout as well as the content so it can adapt to different form factors automatically.

Samples.Name: HamburgerMenu
Samples.About: The HamburgerMenu is deprecated and will be removed in a future major release. Please use the NavigationView available in the Fall Creators Update.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The HamburgerMenu is deprecated and will be removed in a future major release. Please use the NavigationView available in the Fall Creators Update.

Samples.Name: RangeSelector
Samples.About: The RangeSelector is a "double slider" control for range values.

Samples.Name: ImageEx
Samples.About: Images are downloaded asynchronously showing a load indicator. Source images are then stored in the App local cache to preserve resources and load time.

Samples.Name: HeaderedTextBlock
Samples.About: The HeaderedTextBlock control is designed to provide a header for read only text. This control is useful for displaying read only forms.

Samples.Name: MasterDetailsView
Samples.About: The MasterDetailsView control allows the user to implement the Master/Details design pattern.

Samples.Name: MarkdownTextBlock
Samples.About: An efficient and extensible control that can parse and render markdown.

Samples.Name: RadialGauge
Samples.About: The radial gauge displays a value within a range, using a needle on a circular face.

Samples.Name: RadialProgressBar
Samples.About: The radial progress bar displays progress as a circle getting filled.

Samples.Name: SlidableListItem
Samples.About: The SlidableListItem is deprecated and will be removed in a future major release. Please use the SwipeControl available in the Fall Creators Update.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The SlidableListItem is deprecated and will be removed in a future major release. Please use the SwipeControl available in the Fall Creators Update.

Samples.Name: PullToRefreshListView
Samples.About: PullToRefreshListView is derived from the built in ListView in the Universal Windows Platform. It enables the popular Pull To Refresh pattern.

Samples.Name: RotatorTile
Samples.About: RotatorTile is an ItemsControl that rotates through a set of items one-by-one. It enables you to show multiple items of data in a live-tile like way.

Samples.Name: BladeView
Samples.About: BladeView provides a horizontal collection of blades for master-detail scenarios. The control is based on the experience demonstrated by the Azure Portal.

Samples.Name: ScrollHeader
Samples.About: A UI control that works as a ListView or GridView header control with quick return, sticky and fade behavior.

Samples.Name: GridSplitter
Samples.About: GridSplitter represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a Grid control.

Samples.Name: DropShadowPanel
Samples.About: DropShadowPanel contol allows the creation of a DropShadow for any Xaml FrameworkElement in markup.

Samples.Name: Loading
Samples.About: LoadingControl helps to show content with animation to the user while the app is doing some calculation.

Samples.Name: Expander
Samples.About: Expander control allows user to show/hide content based on a boolean state.

Samples.Name: TileControl
Samples.About: A ContentControl that show an image repeated many times.The control can be synchronized with a Scrollviewer and animated easily

Samples.Name: WrapPanel
Samples.About: The WrapPanel Control positions child elements in sequential position from left to right, breaking content to the next line at the edge of the containing box.

Samples.Name: OrbitView
Samples.About: The OrbitView Control positions items in a circle around a center element and supports orbits and anchors.

Samples.Name: Menu
Samples.About: Represents a Windows menu control that enables you to hierarchically organize elements associated with commands and event handlers.

Samples.Name: InAppNotification
Samples.About: The In App Notification control offers the ability to show local notifications in your application.

Samples.Name: DockPanel
Samples.About: Defines an area where you can arrange child elements either horizontally or vertically, relative to each other.

Samples.Name: HeaderedContentControl
Samples.About: Allows content to be displayed with a specified header.

Samples.Name: HeaderedItemsControl
Samples.About: Allows items to be displayed with a specified header.

Samples.Name: StaggeredPanel
Samples.About: Allows items to be displayed with a specified header.

Samples.Name: LottieAnimationView
Samples.About: The LottieAnimationView Control renders Lottie animations (Adobe After Effects files exported as JSON files).

Samples.Name: LiveTile
Samples.About: This shows how to update a Live Tile with a rich Adaptive notification.

Samples.Name: Toast
Samples.About: This shows how to send a Toast notification.

Samples.Name: WeatherLiveTileAndToast
Samples.About: This shows how to send a Weather Live Tile and Toast notification, displaying the forecast.

Samples.Name: Fade
Samples.About: Opacity of XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Scale
Samples.About: Scale of XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Offset
Samples.About: Offset of XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Rotate
Samples.About: Rotation on XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Blur
Samples.About: Blur XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Saturation
Samples.About: Saturate XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: Light
Samples.About: Light XAML elements using composition

Samples.Name: FadeHeader
Samples.About: Fade ListView and GridView Headers

Samples.Name: ParallaxService
Samples.About: The ParallaxService is deprecated and will be removed in a future major release. Please use the ParallaxView available in the Fall Creators Update.
Samples.DeprecatedWarning: The ParallaxService is deprecated and will be removed in a future major release. Please use the ParallaxView available in the Fall Creators Update.

Samples.Name: ReorderGridAnimation
Samples.About: Animates items of a grid when the size changes

Samples.Name: Implicit Animations
Samples.About: Attached properties to enable Implicit animations (including Show and Hide animations) through XAML

Samples.Name: Connected Animations
Samples.About: Attached properties to enable Connected animations through XAML

Samples.Name: Bing Service
Samples.About: The Bing Service allows you to retrieve Microsoft Bing web search engine results.

Samples.Name: Facebook Service
Samples.About: The Facebook Service allows you to retrieve or publish data to Facebook graph.

Samples.Name: Twitter Service
Samples.About: The Twitter Service allows you to retrieve or publish data to Twitter.

Samples.Name: Microsoft Graph Service
Samples.About: The Microsoft Graph service allows you to connect to Microsoft Graph Office 365 API.

Samples.Name: OneDrive Service
Samples.About: The OneDrive service allows you to get your files from OneDrive using an Microsoft Account or OneDrive For Business using an Office 365 account

Samples.Name: LinkedIn Service
Samples.About: The LinkedIn service allows you to connect to retrieve or publish data to LinkedIn.

Samples.Name: Microsoft Translator Service
Samples.About: The Microsoft Translator Service allows you to translate text into many languages.

Samples.Name: ImageCache
Samples.About: The ImageCache allows persistence of images with an option to use in-memory storage.

Samples.Name: Object Storage
Samples.About: The Object Storage helper allows you to easily read and save objects in your application, both locally or on every device (roaming).

Samples.Name: Incremental Loading Collection
Samples.About: Allows to create collections that can be loaded incrementally, as user requests more items in the view. This type of collections can be bound to controls like GridView and ListView.

Samples.Name: BackgroundTaskHelper
Samples.About: Allows easy registration and maintenance of background task

Samples.Name: NetworkHelper
Samples.About: The NetworkHelper class is used to determine whether the app has Internet, and if it is on a metered Internet connection

Samples.Name: BluetoothLEHelper
Samples.About: The Bluetooth LE helper class is used to connect and interact with bluetooth LE devices.

Samples.Name: SystemInformation
Samples.About: The SystemInformation class provides easy access to some of system/app/device information

Samples.Name: PrintHelper
Samples.About: Allows to easily print XAML controls

Samples.Name: DispatcherHelper
Samples.About: Allows easy interaction with Windows Runtime core message dispatcher for multi-threaded scenario (I.E: Run code on UI thread).

Samples.Name: AdvancedCollectionView
Samples.About: Allows you to easily sort and filter your collections before displaying them.

Samples.Name: BackdropBlurBrush
Samples.About: Brush which fills the contents with a blurred version of whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropInvertBrush
Samples.About: Brush which fills the contents with an inverted version of whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropGammaTransferBrush
Samples.About: Brush which fills the contents with a gamma modified version of whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropSaturationBrush
Samples.About: Brush which applies a Saturation effect to whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: BackdropSepiaBrush
Samples.About: Brush which applies a Sepia effect to whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: ImageBlendBrush
Samples.About: Brush which applies a blending effect a given image from whatever's behind it.

Samples.Name: RadialGradientBrush
Samples.About: A composition brush which creates a radial gradient effect.

Samples.Name: ListViewExtensions
Samples.About: Extensions for all controls that inherit from ListViewBase like ListView.

Samples.Name: ViewExtensions
Samples.About: View extensions to set StatusBar and TitleBar properties.

Samples.Name: TextBoxMask
Samples.About: TextBox Mask property allows a user to more easily enter fixed width text in TextBox control where you would like them to enter the data in a certain format

Samples.Name: Mouse
Samples.About: Mouse.Cursor attached property enables you to easily change the mouse cursor over specific Framework elements.

Samples.Name: TextBoxRegex
Samples.About: TextBoxRegex helps developer to validate a TextBox with a regular expression using the Regex property.

Samples.Name: SurfaceDialTextbox
Samples.About: Enables support for Surface Dial on any given Textbox. Rotate the Dial to change the numeric value of the Textbox.

Samples.Name: Visual Extensions
Samples.About: Attached properties to modify object visual properties through XAML

Samples.Name: FrameworkElementExtensions
Samples.About: Extensions for all the FrameworkElement controls.

Samples.Name: StringExtensions
Samples.About: String Extensions to validate strings

Samples.Name: NavigationViewStyles
Samples.About: Style extensions for the NavigationView to appear like the one used by Visual Studio Code.

Samples.Name: ScrollViewerExtensions
Samples.About: Extensions for all controls that contain a ScrollViewer like ListView.

Samples.Name: Markdown Parser
Samples.About: The Markdown Parser allows you to parse a Markdown String into a Markdown Document, and then Render it with a Markdown Renderer.

Samples.Name: RSS Parser
Samples.About: The RSS Parser allows you to parse an RSS content String into RSS Schema.

Samples.Name: AlignmentGrid
Samples.About: AlignmentGrid is used to display a grid to help aligning controls.

Samples.Name: FocusTracker
Samples.About: FocusTracker can be used to display information about the current focused XAML element.

Samples.Name: Analytics
Samples.About: List of frameworks to help you track activity in your apps.
